Shadowcaster could sense something was wrong with one
of the crew, something which while not greatly
troubling him, gave him cause to question just what
coming back from the martrix can do to the spark of a
Transformer.

'Is this what happens to bots who come back from the
other side?' he thought to himself.

Drawing on zen meditation techniques which he'd
downloaded during one trip to earth during the great
war, Shadowcaster let himself relax, letting the
sensation take hold, before focusing on where it might
be coming from, the vague details becoming more
specific, until he finally had a clear picture in his
mind of who it was and what was going on.

Reaching through the matrix directly to her spark, he
started to comfort her.

"You, know, as long as we have those around us who
love usw and care about us, we are never truly alone."

At the same time, he sent her reassuring feelings that
se was loved and cared about.
 --- airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:

missed feel him and be a family, someone always was
separa them, 
first Hydras now Unicron...
